snippet.title: Unmaze | Release Teaser | ARTE Creative
snippet.description:
Two young boys are lost in a maze. It is up to you, Ariadne, to guide them to safety, ouf of the labyrinth.
Put your phone in the light to talk to one of them, or in the dark to talk to the other. The more you help one move forward, the more the other gets lost
Will you be able to guide them both to the exit ?

For more information :
Twitter : https://twitter.com/unmazegame
Discord : https://discord.gg/2Qvwt645q7
website : http://unmaze.arte.tv/

And also :
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/Creative.ARTE
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/artefr
Twitter : https://twitter.com/artefr
